nodes.text: The Ladara Vex was a light cruiser in the navy of the First Order. Commander Branwayne Spiftz acquired the Ladara Vex for a mission to the planet Minfar. The Ladara Vex was destroyed by Poe Dameron, who along with Rose Tico, Rey, and BB-8, was called to assist Minfar by the native Zixon.
